column4: Banshee says i have a codec missing called "text/html decoder" but the music file i'm trying to play is an mp3. i have tried the mp3 file with other music player but the same error is occurring.
yes i have all the codecs installed
all my other mp3 file work just not this one
looks like a broken download; instead of getting a mp3 you actually must have gotten a plaintext file instead
